sides.title: Integrated S-foils (Closed)
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is not in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 fewer attack die. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Integrated S-foils (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform [Torpedo] and [Missile] attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack. Add [Torpedo] and [Missile] slots.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Closed)
sides.ability: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die. After you execute a [0 [Stationary]] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90째 or 180째. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform [Cannon] attacks. While you perform a [Cannon] attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice. Add [Cannon] slot.

sides.title: Grappling Struts (Closed)
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Grappling Struts (Open)
sides.ability: You ignore obstacles at range 0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2 [Straight]] and are at range 0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1 stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90째 in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.

sides.title: Calibrated Laser Targeting
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], add 1 [Focus] result.

sides.title: Landing Struts (Closed)
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you execute a maneuver, if you overlap an asteroid or debris cloud and there are 1 or fewer other friendly ships at range 0 of that obstacle, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Landing Struts (Open)
sides.ability: You ignore obstacles at range 0 and while you move through them. After you reveal your dial, if you reveal a maneuver other than a [2 [Straight]] and are at range 0 of an asteroid or debris cloud, skip your Execute Maneuver step and remove 1 stress token; if you revealed a right or left maneuver, rotate your ship 90째 in that direction. After you execute a maneuver, flip this card.
